inputs.name: Collector Type
inputs.help_text: Select the type of collector to configure.

inputs.name: Auth Table Timeout
inputs.help_text: Specify the timeout value (in minutes) for the authentication table.

actions.description: Allows the user to add a new collector type to the profiler.
Enables backup and recovery for profiler deployments.

constraints.description: Only TCP, SMB, LDAP, and SNMP are supported as collector types.
The timeout value must be between 1 and 1440 minutes.

errors.description: The selected collector type is not supported.
errors.resolution: Choose a valid collector type from the dropdown.

errors.description: The specified timeout value is outside the allowed range.
errors.resolution: Enter a value between 1 and 1440 minutes.

steps: Select the collector type from the dropdown.
Configure the required fields such as Auth Table Timeout.
Select the backup option and specify the destination.
